title: Cowboys, Michael Jordan, where Colin was right and wrong
itunes:title: Cowboys, Michael Jordan, where Colin was right and wrong
description:
Colin talks about the Cowboys signing Andy Dalton, Michael Jordan never changing who he is, poor company decisions, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Charles Barkley, Jane Slater, and George Karl.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
